Ingredients:

  • 1 cup jasmine rice
  • 1 lb (450g) chicken, cut into serving pieces
  • 6 cups chicken broth
  • 1 thumb-sized piece of ginger, peeled and minced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 medium-sized onion, chopped
  • 2 tablespoons cooking oil
  • Fish sauce (patis), to taste
  • Ground black pepper, to taste

Toppings:

  • Fried garlic
  • Sliced green onions
  • Calamansi or lemon wedges
  • Hard-boiled eggs (optional)

Instructions:

  1. Rinse the jasmine rice under cold water until the water runs clear. Set aside.

  2. In a large pot, heat the cooking oil over medium heat. Add the minced ginger, garlic, and onion. Saut√© until fragrant and the onion becomes translucent.

  3. Add the chicken pieces to the pot and cook until they are lightly browned on all sides.

  4. Pour in the chicken broth and bring it to a boil. Once boiling, lower the heat to a simmer and cover the pot. Let it cook for about 30 minutes, or until the chicken is tender and cooked through.

  5. Remove the chicken pieces from the pot and set them aside to cool. Once cooled, shred the chicken meat into small, bite-sized pieces. Discard any bones or skin.

  6. Return the shredded chicken to the pot and add the rinsed jasmine rice. Stir well to combine.

  7. Continue cooking the arroz caldo over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, for about 30 minutes or until the rice has cooked and thickened the porridge. If the porridge becomes too thick, you can add more chicken broth or water to achieve your desired consistency.

  8. Season the arroz caldo with fish sauce (patis) and ground black pepper to taste. Adjust the seasoning according to your preference.

  9. To serve, ladle the arroz caldo into bowls. Garnish each bowl with fried garlic, sliced green onions, and a squeeze of calamansi or lemon juice. You can also top it with hard-boiled eggs if desired.

  10. Serve the arroz caldo while it's still hot and enjoy its comforting flavors.

Arroz Caldo is perfect for breakfast or as a warming dish during cold weather. It's a hearty and filling rice porridge that is sure to satisfy.
